questionTrans.en: Does this idea simplify a process or a document? (e.g. documentation error reduction, reduce process steps)
questionTrans.es: ¿Simplifica un documento o proceso? ( por ejemplo: reduce errores de documentación, elimina pasos redundantes)

results.question: Does this idea simplify a process or a document?

questionTrans.en: Does this idea help to align current process practices with a procedure?

results.question: Does this idea help to align current process practices with a procedure?

questionTrans.en: Does this idea help to prevent defects, regulatory issues, product recall or customer complaints?
questionTrans.es: ¿Ayuda a prevenir a corregir defectos, situaciones regulatorias, o situaciones en el mercado como recogido de producto, quejas de clientes?

results.question: Does this idea help to prevent defects, regulatory issues, product recall or customer complaints?

questionTrans.en: Does this idea help in reducing the process steps and reducing non-value added activities?

results.question: Does this idea help in reducing the process steps and reducing non-value added activities?

questionTrans.en: Does this idea help to reduce the execution times without compromising quality? How much?

results.question: Does this idea help to achieve the  strategic projects defined in Baxter Guayama within its timeframe?

¿Por cuánto?
